ygData.msgSnippet: Ragnar stepped in, bending over to enter the relatively low room. As he was fifteen feet tall, there were few rooms he d consider the right size, the cargo bay

Ragnar stepped in, bending over to enter the relatively low room. As 
he was fifteen feet tall, there were few rooms he'd consider the right 
size, the cargo bay excepted.

Ragnar: Of course. Commander Prime, let me introduce Warriors Windlord 
and Aerotaur.

Katya waited in the corner of the room, opening her small head 
compartment and taking out the sphere piece. She would wait after the 
introductions to know more about this small treasure she held in the 
palm of her hand.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Go relax in your quarters, and I'll join you later, 
love. Bye.
> 
> Rodimus goes to his office and takes his seat.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Sorry about the wait. Now Ragnar, could you introduce 
me?
